title: La Mujer Del Diablo
overview: The Devil's Woman tells the story of Natalia Vallejo, an elementary school teacher with dreams of leaving her town to pursue a tourism career, and Cristo Beltr√°n, a high-ranking criminal who appears to be the benefactor of the town. When he becomes obsessed with Natalia although she is in love with another man, he does the unimaginable to seduce her.
